div.data-alt: Logo of Passport Academy Charter School - Powered by K12

div.p: GCA

Just In: School will be closed for the rest of the year in the entire state of PA. We will finish the school year online. Go to our COVID-19 Information Page for information regarding COVID-19 and what is going on at the school in regards to the Distance Learning.
Just In: Distance Learning has begun. Click here for more information! [PDF]
Just In: For those interested in enrolling at Passport Academy Charter School on April 24, 2020 there will be a Live Information Session and Q & A (12 P.M.-1 P.M.) - Register here!
Welcome Passport Academy Charter School Families

p.span: Whenever you find yourself doubting how far you can go. Just remember how far you have come.
Whenever you find yourself doubting how far you can go. Just remember how far you have come.

I invite everyone who is interested in being part of a school community that thrives on listening, dedication, spirit, and flexibility to come see us and experience our Wolfpack Pride. Run with the PAC…and see where your future will take you!

div.p: Mr. Jackson | Principal

div.p: Accepting New Students
The Passport Academy Charter School is now accepting new students for the 2020-21 School Year. Call 412-376-3724 or go to the schools facebook to learn more.

p.b: April 24, 2020 - Live Information Session and Q & A (12 P.M.-1 P.M.) - Register here!

div.p: Accepting New Students
The Passport Academy Charter School is now accepting new students for the 2020-21 School Year. Call 412-376-3724 or go to the schools facebook to learn more.
COVID-19 School Closure and Virtual Learning
Begining on April 6, 2020, Passport Academy Charter School will begin virtual online learning. Students should receive more information from the teachers regarding this.

div.p: COVID-19 School Closure and Virtual Learning
Begining on April 6, 2020, Passport Academy Charter School will begin virtual online learning. Students should receive more information from the teachers regarding this.

a.title: Student Parent Instructions - opens in a new window

div.p: Graduation

There WILL BE a graduation ceremony. Caps and Gowns have been ordered. We may have to change the date, time and place of the ceremony, but we will celebrate the commencement of our seniors. Stay tuned for more information.
Graduation

There WILL BE a graduation ceremony. Caps and Gowns have been ordered. We may have to change the date, time and place of the ceremony, but we will celebrate the commencement of our seniors. Stay tuned for more information.
The Pittsburgh Public School Board renewed the five-year charter for the Hill House Passport Academy.
Watch a quick 3 minute video on how to navigate through the online section of the school.

Hill House Passport Charter Academy Charter School (HHPACS), a tuition-free public charter school for under-credited students, serving students under 21 who have not been able to finish their high school education, celebrated the Class of 2019 at an in-person commencement ceremony on Friday, June 7th.

div.class: col-md-3 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 PL-0 contactColumn accordian

div.p:
933 Penn Avenue,
Pittsburgh, PA 15222
Email: contact@hhpacs.org

Families do not pay tuition for a student to attend an online public school. Common household items and office supplies like printer ink and paper are not provided. Our enrollment consultants can help address your technological and computer questions and needs.
